DOCNAME: CASE OF COOPERATIVA AGRICOLA SLOBOZIA-HANESEI v. MOLDOVA
CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Non-pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , ORG FAC ” , is a NORP registered company . It is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON ORG , a lawyer practising in FAC .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . According to the statute of the ORG - owned company “ Moldtranselectro ” ( “ LOC ) , as modified on DATE , the company is empowered to consolidate the debts accumulated in the energy sector of GPE and is responsible both for lodging claims against entities indebted to the former ( ORG ) energy companies and for paying the debts that those companies owed to third persons . This is regulated by PERSON no . CARDINAL on the restructuring of the debt of energy sector companies ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) . In a letter dated DATE ORG ( ORG ) stated , inter alia , that in accordance with LAW no . TIME ( “ Law no . CARDINAL ” , see paragraph CARDINAL below ) PERSON had acquired all debts and claims of legal persons in respect of ORG , a ORG - owned energy company which was privatised after DATE .

CARDINAL . The applicant initiated court proceedings against ORG as a third party . It claimed that ORG owed it CARDINAL NORP lei ( ORG ) since DATE and that its debts had become the debts of PERSON by virtue of PERSON no . CARDINAL . On DATE ORG adopted a judgment by which PERSON was ordered to pay the applicant MDL CARDINAL ( MONEY ( ORG ) at the time ) . The court found that , in accordance with LAW no . CARDINAL both the debts of ORG and the debts owed to it had been transferred to PERSON , as confirmed by an act of verification dated DATE . No appeal was lodged and the judgment became enforceable on DATE .

CARDINAL . The applicant obtained an enforcement warrant which the Bailiff did not enforce . On DATE it wrote to ORG of ORG requesting the execution of the judgment and the seizure of its debtor 's property . On DATE it wrote to “ the Government ” requesting the latter to take measures to execute the judgment . The applicant received no answer to any of these requests .

CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE has not been enforced to date . On DATE the ORG adopted the PERSON concerning the improvement of the economic - financial situation of ORG “ Moldtranselectro ” by annulling certain obligations ( no . PERSON ) . The law annulled a number of penalties resulting from delays in payments by PERSON towards the ORG budget .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant provisions of domestic law have been set out in this ORG 's judgment in the case of GPE v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , ECHR CARDINALIII ( extracts ) , § CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . In addition , the relevant provisions of the PERSON on the restructuring of the debt of energy sector companies no . CARDINAL-XIV read as follows :
“ Article CARDINAL
The following companies ... [ RED Centru ] ... shall be privatised without their debts DATE owed to or claimable against third parties ...
Article CARDINAL
Pending the [ privatisation ] of energy sector companies , the following debts shall be frozen :
CARDINAL ) of [ list of energy sector companies ] owed to the ORG company “ Moldtranselectro ” ;
Article CARDINAL

Debts older than DATE at the moment of [ privatisation ] of [ private ] companies owed to the energy sector companies which are to be privatised shall become debts owed to the ORG company “ Moldtranselectro ” .
Article CARDINAL
The Government
CARDINAL ) NORP shall become the legal successor :

b ) in the person of ORG Moldtranselectro " - of credit indebtedness of the electricity sector enterprises undergoing privatisation DATE overdue as of the date of signing contracts for the sale of the majority stake in their shares , except for arrears of wages , contributions ( payments ) to the state social insurance fund and the debt written off pursuant to DATE , paragraph CARDINAL ) ;

... CARDINAL ) NORP shall formulate proposals identifying the sources of financing the difference between the debts owed to ' Moldtranselectro ' and accumulated by it in accordance with LAW present law and of paragraph CARDINAL b ) of the present Article . ”
